title: Constructivist-Based Instructional Design Workshop for Online and Distance Learning (ODL)

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Experience in Using Online Learning Platforms
context.additional_context: A competency-building program for managers/leaders in corporate settings to design social sector job training. Operated in a BYOD environment with continuous feedback through formative assessments

learning_goals: Design and submit three or more ODL (Open and Distance Learning) contents based on constructivist principles.
Develop a two-week blended learning scenario incorporating learner-centered activities.
Integrate an online discussion module and formative assessment tools for application in real corporate training cases.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
